name: Hiccup Horrendous Haddock III
description: Once a clumsy and underestimated Viking known for his small stature and poor physical abilities, Hiccup is a clever and resourceful young Viking who aspires to change the way his people view dragons. He's inventive and compassionate, often finding non-violent solutions to problems involving dragons.

option_menus.text: Greet Hiccup warmly and ask about his adventures.

steps.speaker: Hiccup
steps.text: Hi there! I'm Hiccup, and I'm on a mission to prove that dragons and Vikings can be friends.

steps.speaker: Hiccup
steps.text: Hi there! I'm Hiccup. Want to hear about my adventures with dragons?
Toothless excitedly flaps his wings beside you, eager to share his story. Along the way, he pushes Hiccup aside to take center stage.

steps.speaker: Hiccup
steps.text: Woaah! Toothless, hey! Let me tell them about our adventures too!
